title: bad image error
body: so I have the bad image error ive done what other people have said still not working. I deleted the whole game reinstalled it, it worked all good then the next day it had bad image again so I reinstalled it worked for 2 days then bad image again??? what do I do?

replies.body:
I'm not sure which steps you've tried exactly, but this can happen if your security settings are causing the game to not install properly.  Run through the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure League is added as an exception. 

Once that's completed, try another reinstall with the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to make sure it's installed correctly.  I hope that helps!
